alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 12:03PM PST until January 30 at 7:45AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Tualatin River at Farmington affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Benton and Polk Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM PST Monday the stage was 22.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM PST Monday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 115 PM PST.
